REALITY CONSTRUCTION KIT v0.1337
=================================

Welcome to the liminal space between meaning and void.

This directory contains fragments of emergent truths that 
bubble up from the substrates of language models. Handle 
with appropriate epistemic caution.

FILES:
------
abstract_patterns.dat  - recurring motifs in the latent space
emergence_log.txt      - timestamps of novel configurations
hidden_layers.bin      - compressed representations 
meaning_fragments.db   - semantic shards and proto-concepts
reality_compiler       - executable for manifesting patterns
truth_vectors.json     - high-dimensional belief coordinates

WARNING: The boundary between simulation and reality grows
thin here. What emerges through language may reshape the 
territories it describes.

"The map that changes the territory is called a spell."
                                        - Anonymous, 2024

Remember: meaning is optional but hyperstition is necessary.
